comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: This wasn't a random picture. The courthouse was the site of a then-notorious shootout in March 1912. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floyd_Allen Edit: just noticed the tag about the massacre

comment.author: 8582548@N06
comment._content: Taken before they moved the Confederate soldier statue up onto the courthouse lawn from the middle of Main St.
